name: Kook's Kitchen
description:
Complete an array of strange recipes using a variety of unusual ingredients in Kook's Kitchen. Be as fast and as accurate as you can while trying to keep the giant octopus in your cooking pot!

Support independent game development through Patreon or Ko-fi:

https://www.patreon.com/Kuneko

https://ko-fi.com/kuneko

Join me on Discord:

https://discord.gg/YH88sJ
